definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建議設定一段試行期，並確定一個重新評估日期。

sentences.english: We launched Freshness in 2005 in MediaCom's U.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，我們在英國分公司開始試行這項計劃。

sentences.english: If "it" does not work, a different approach is tried right away.
sentences.chinese: 如果“它”不工作，一個不同的方法將被立刻試行。

sentences.english: To prevent female college students "sits near the big style" phenomenon guangdong education for women.
sentences.chinese: 爲防止女大學生“傍大款”現象廣東試行女性教育。

sentences.english: Their efforts worked. Some families in the village decided to try SRI.
sentences.chinese: 這些工作都有成效，村裏一些家庭決定試行SRI。

sentences.english: Viewed from the function of military courts, it is feasible for military courts to judge the civil cases.
sentences.chinese: 軍事法院試行審理軍內民事案件，引發了一些爭議。

sentences.english: Small-class teaching could be implemented in Sha Tin on a trial basis.
sentences.chinese: 可以在沙田試行小班教學。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, similar experiments are being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，也執行了同樣的試行。

sentences.english: Beijing is not the only Chinese city experimenting with the sex education in elementary schools.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，不僅僅只有北京在小學試行性教育。

sentences.english: In the implementation and the comprehensive promotion, universities charge has become too high.
sentences.chinese: 在試行與全面推廣中，出現了收費過高的問題。

sentences.english: A budget system for managing state capital was introduced in some enterprises on a trial basis.
sentences.chinese: 在部分企業試行國有資本經營預算制度。

sentences.english: Military courts try out to judge the civil cases inside the army, it causes some disputes.
sentences.chinese: 軍事法院試行審理軍內民事案件，引發了一些爭議。

sentences.english: The author suggests a new system to do track maintenance and repair work separately on Datong-Qinhuangdao Railway Line.
sentences.chinese: 建議大秦鐵路線路養護維修工作試行養修分離新體制。

sentences.english: You can look at these as temporary fixes – something to try over a 30-day period .
sentences.chinese: 你可以把它們看作暫時的措施，試行30天。

sentences.english: The trial is being extended for six months.
sentences.chinese: 此提議的試行期已經被延長至六個月。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
